UniprotID	Q5SSJ5-3
Accession	Q5SSJ5;A6NI71;A8K5D7;B3KMZ8;B4E210;Q05BI0;Q5SSJ6;Q5SWC6;Q6PIM9;Q8NDF0;Q9UHY0
EntryName	HP1B3_HUMAN
ProteinName	Heterochromatin protein 1-binding protein 3 (Protein HP1-BP74)
GeneName	HP1BP3
Length	401
Function	Component of heterochromatin that maintains heterochromatin integrity during G1/S progression and regulates the duration of G1 phase to critically influence cell proliferative capacity (PubMed:24830416). Mediates chromatin condensation during hypoxia, leading to increased tumor cell viability, radio-resistance, chemo-resistance and self-renewal (PubMed:25100860).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus; Chromosome
Disorder	
ExposeBuried	
SurfaceAccessbility

Hydropathy
